snippet: Efforts to reach a cease-fire in Ukraine also helped prices, as did a slump in crude oil prices, which sent airline stocks surging.
abstract: Corporate deal news gives stock market a lift as bidding contest emrges for discount retailer Family Dollar Stores, while report of diplomatic efforts to broker cease-fire in Ukraine also helps boost share prices.
lead_paragraph: Efforts to reach a cease-fire in Ukraine also helped prices, as did a slump in crude oil prices, which sent airline stocks surging.

headline.main: Merger Competition Among Dollar Stores Lifts Wall Street
headline.print_headline: Merger Competition Among Dollar Stores Lifts Wall Street
